smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: ConstructorParameterNaming
smells.description: Constructor parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: Unconfined cannot be safely cast to CoroutineContext.
StubApi() cannot be safely cast to Api.
register.values[0] cannot be safely cast to InfoUiModel.Success.
register.values[0] cannot be safely cast to MapUiModel.Success.
register.values[0] cannot be safely cast to MapUiModel.Success.
register.values[0] cannot be safely cast to BrewersUiModel.Success.
register.values[0] cannot be safely cast to StylesUiModel.Success.
mapUiModelRegister.lastValue!! cannot be safely cast to MapUiModel.Success.
it.arguments[0] cannot be safely cast to Brewer.
it.arguments[0] cannot be safely cast to Beer.
stylesUiModelRegister.lastValue cannot be safely cast to StylesUiModel.Success.
it.arguments[0] cannot be safely cast to Style.
it.arguments[0] cannot be safely cast to Beer.
brewersUiModelRegister.lastValue cannot be safely cast to BrewersUiModel.Success.
it.arguments[0] cannot be safely cast to Brewer.
starsUiModelRegister.lastValue cannot be safely cast to StarsUiModel.Success.
register.lastValue cannot be safely cast to StarsUiModel.Success.
HttpApi(get()) cannot be safely cast to Api.
UI cannot be safely cast to CoroutineContext.
IntentNavigator(get()) cannot be safely cast to Navigator.
tags_layout.getChildAt(tags_layout.childCount - 1) cannot be safely cast to TextView.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (register.values[0] as InfoUiModel.Success) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: register.values[0] as InfoUiModel.Success
Parentheses in (register.values[0] as MapUiModel.Success) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: register.values[0] as MapUiModel.Success
Parentheses in (register.values[0] as MapUiModel.Success) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: register.values[0] as MapUiModel.Success
Parentheses in (register.values[0] as BrewersUiModel.Success) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: register.values[0] as BrewersUiModel.Success
Parentheses in (register.values[0] as StylesUiModel.Success) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: register.values[0] as StylesUiModel.Success
Parentheses in (register.lastValue as StarsUiModel.Success) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: register.lastValue as StarsUiModel.Success

Parentheses in (request.url.host == "twitter.com" || request.url.host == "mobile.twitter.com") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: request.url.host == "twitter.com" || request.url.host == "mobile.twitter.com"

Parentheses in (request.url.host == "www.facebook.com" || request.url.host == "m.facebook.com") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: request.url.host == "www.facebook.com" || request.url.host == "m.facebook.com"
Parentheses in (System.currentTimeMillis() - timestamp) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: System.currentTimeMillis() - timestamp
Parentheses in (System.currentTimeMillis() - maxAgeInMillis) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: System.currentTimeMillis() - maxAgeInMillis

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: nl.brouwerijdemolen.borefts2013.gui.screens.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class MemoryCache defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class Poi defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
